channel.title: How can i change the text at the top of my client?
channel.description:
Hello.
I downloaded a "Combattscape" source and client.
Then tried to edit the client, but i cant figure out how to edit the buttons and the text at the top!
Heres a pic: (What's in the red circle is what i want to edit!) [img]http://i37.tinypic.com/2s1ncyc.jpg[/img]
Thanks!

item.title: How can i change the text at the top of my client?
item.dc:creator: @coder_allter coder allter
item.description:
@coder_allter wrote:

FrameSub_1

:CTR F:

setTitle(“Combattscape”);

Replace the combattscape to ur servers name then compile and run

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 11, 2009, 02:31:34 pm[/size][hr]Idk about the buttons im trying to figure out how to add them lol
